about_the_game: The Musical Dominotes is a twist on the classic dominoes game, where the dots are replaced by musical notes and rests that represent certain time values. It is a fun 3D educational, tile-based board game where the main goal is to teach the player about the common time value of musical notes and rests by matching the appropriate combinations. The game features configurable popular domino game mods like Draw, Block and All Fives. Player can choose from multiple stunning tile sets and board designs.
detailed_description: The Musical Dominotes is a twist on the classic dominoes game, where the dots are replaced by musical notes and rests that represent certain time values. It is a fun 3D educational, tile-based board game where the main goal is to teach the player about the common time value of musical notes and rests by matching the appropriate combinations. The game features configurable popular domino game mods like Draw, Block and All Fives. Player can choose from multiple stunning tile sets and board designs.
name: Musical Dominotes

short_description: An educational tile-based board game, the Musical Dominotes, is a twist on the classic dominoes game, where the dots are replaced by musical notes and rests that represent certain time values.
